cfp::Token Class Reference

A group of adjacent characters with a special meaning within a formula string. More...

Detailed Description

A group of adjacent characters with a special meaning within a formula string.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum cfp::Token::Type

The type of a Token within a formula.

See also:
std::operator<<(std::ostream&, const cfp::Token::Type&)
Enumerator:
TYPE_SYMBOL 

An element symbol.

TYPE_GROUP 

A group characterized by parentheses.

TYPE_INT 

A natural number.

TYPE_FLOAT 

A real number.

TYPE_NONE 

Nothing/Invalid.
